txt.en: A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Western Barricade!
The Chamber of Mazarbul is under attack!
The Eastern Barricade is about to be attacked!
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Southern Hall Barricade!
The Western Barricade is about to be attacked!
The Northern Hall Barricade has been defended!
'All right boys, get in here and show them who rules Moria now!'
'The Orcs are nearly upon us! Defend our barricades as best you can!'
The Southern Barricade has been defended!
Requires a furled banner to be placed on the pedestal to use.
'Remember the banners of the dwarves. Unfurl them when the battle seems at its darkest.'
'Aaah!'
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Northern Hall Barricade!
'These banners can stir the hearts of dwarves, Men and Elves to great deeds!'
'Uuuh....'
'Go now and help the Dwarves of Moria make their stand!'
'Nooooo!'
'Uuugh....'
'Aaargh!'
Goblin-sappers are attacking the barricades!
'The sappers have destroyed our barricades! Fall back! Fall back!'
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Chamber of Mazarbul!
The Northern Hall Barricade is about to be attacked!
A barrier has fallen at the Eastern Barricade!
Unfurled Banners
The Western Barricade has been defended!
'You runts ain't done a bad job, but I think it's time to end this, eh?'
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Eastern Barricade!
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Southern Barricade!
A barrier has fallen at the Southern Barricade!
The Southern Hall Barricade is about to be attacked!
A barrier has fallen at the Southern Hall Barricade!
The Southern Barricade is about to be attacked!
The Eastern Barricade has been defended!
A barrier has fallen at the Western Barricade!
A barrier has fallen at the Northern Hall Barricade!
Wíli, the leader of the defences, has sounded a retreat!
The Southern Hall Barricade has been defended!
Goblin-sappers are attacking the barricades!
'Fall back! Fall back!'
'We cannot hold them here! Fall back to the Chamber of Mazarbul!'
Must be defending the central camp of the Twenty First Hall.
Must be defending the hall outside the Chamber of Mazarbul.
Must be defending the Chamber of Mazarbul.
